alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued November 19 at 12:51PM PST until November 19 at 2:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM PST FOR NORTH CENTRAL SAN BERNARDINO AND SOUTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 1249 PM PST, a dust channel continues near Primm and across Interstate 15. HAZARD...Near zero visibility. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following roads... Interstate 15 in California between mile markers 175 and 186. Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 1 and 7. State Route 164 in Clark County between mile markers 1 and 4. Locations impacted include... Primm, Nipton, Nipton Road Mile Marker 3, and Nipton And Ivanpah Roads. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
